result.execSummary:
The defendant David N Erdman was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Escape-Criminal Arrest, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.42(3)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Costs to be paid within 1 year of today's date or penalty of 39 days jail, consecutive, for non-payment. 
*Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

Extradition costs to be to be paid in 1 year and forwarded to:
District Attorney's Office in the amount of $707.84
Department of Corrections in the amount of $707.84

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. David N Erdman

defendant.name: Erdman, David N
defendant.address: 515 West Moreland Blvd, c/o Waukesha County Jail, Waukesha, WI 53188

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant David N Erdman in court, in custody, with attorney Ryan J. Harrington.   Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.
The Defendant was sentenced as follows:


Count #1:

JAIL: 7 MONTHS, consecutive to any other sentence. 

COSTS: $278.00 (to be paid in 1 year  or serve 39 days jail, consecutive, as penalty for non payment of fine);

DNA SURCHARGE:  $250, to be paid within 1 year.  Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

OTHER: EXTRADITION COSTS - $1415.68 total, $707.84 to be forwarded to District Attorney's Office and $707.84 to Department of Corrections (to be paid within 1 year);
Plea/sentencing hearing on January 9, 2017 at 11:00 am.

Defendant David N Erdman in court, in custody, with attorney Ryan J. Harrington.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.     The parties have reached an agreement which includes the Defendant serving an ATR on 14CF1211 and is expected to meet with his agent in the near future.  Attorney Harrington requests the Court schedule the case for plea and sentencing in a few weeks.  The Court schedules accordingly.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 9, 2017 at 11:00 am.
Defendant waives his/her right to a Preliminary Hearing.

Defendant David N Erdman in court, in custody, with attorney Ryan J. Harrington.   Kevin Michael Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for December 14, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on November 23, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
